branchCategory.name: VP/VG Residual Pressure Release ISO Valve
branchCategory.description: <p>Special versions of the VP and VG series valves that conform to ISO13849-1 safety standard, categories 1 to 4. They are available as dual residual pressure release safety valves with detection of main valve position.</p>

breadCrumb.name: VP/VG Residual Pressure Release ISO Valve

branchItem.name: VP*4*-X536, Residual Pressure Release Valve, ISO13849-1
branchItem.description: <P>Special version of the VP series valve that conforms to ISO13849-1 safety standard, categories 1 and 2. These are a dual residual pressure release valve with detection of main valve position.</P>

branchItem.name: VP*4*-X538, Residual Pressure Release Valve, ISO13849-1
branchItem.description: <P>Special version of the VP series valve that conforms to ISO13849-1 safety standard, categories 3 and 4. These are a dual residual pressure release valve with detection of main valve position.</P>

branchItem.name: VP*4*-X555, Residual Pressure Release Valve, ISO13849-1
branchItem.description: <p>Special version of the VP series valve that conforms to ISO13849-1 safety standard, categories 3 and 4. These are a dual residual pressure release valve with detection of main valve position.</p>

branchItem.name: VG342-X87, Residual Pressure Release Valve, ISO13849-1
branchItem.description: <P>Special version of the VG series valve that conforms to ISO13849-1 safety standard, categories 1 to 4. These are dual residual pressure release safety valve with detection of main valve position.</P>
